feed.title: Google Cloud: Bigtable
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Bigtable

entry.content: You can use protocol buffer (protobuf) schemas to query individual fields within protobuf messages stored as bytes in Bigtable. First, create and manage your protobuf schemas. Then, query your protobuf data using GoogleSQL for Bigtable or BigQuery external tables. This feature is in Preview.
entry.summary: You can now query individual fields within protobuf messages in Bigtable using protobuf schemas. This feature, currently in Preview, supports GoogleSQL for Bigtable and BigQuery external tables.
entry.title: Feature: Query Protobuf Data in Bigtable

entry.content: You can use Cloud KMS Autokey in the Google Cloud console to automate the creation and use of customer-managed encryption keys (CMEK) in Bigtable clusters.
entry.summary: Automate the creation and use of customer-managed encryption keys (CMEK) in Bigtable clusters using Cloud KMS Autokey directly within the Google Cloud console.
entry.title: Feature: Cloud KMS Autokey for Bigtable

entry.content: Bigtable provides vector and key-value store integrations for LangChain, an LLM orchestration framework. For more information, see Build LLM-powered applications using LangChain and Perform Maximal Marginal Relevance search with LangChain on Bigtable.
entry.summary: LangChain, an LLM orchestration framework, now supports Bigtable for both vector and key-value storage.
entry.title: Feature: Bigtable Integrates with LangChain

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Java

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.68.0 (2025-10-22)

Features
  • Add Type API updates needed to support structured keys in materialized views (469290e)
Bug Fixes
  • Add ReadRows/SampleRowKeys bindings for materialized views (469290e)
  • deps: Update the Java code generator (gapic-generator-java) to 2.62.3 (469290e)
  • deps: Update the Java code generator (gapic-generator-java) to 2.63.0 (ed6c03f)
  • Don't use String.format in Preconditions messages (#2691) (62a1812)
  • Fixed the bigtableadmin API name for snippet region tags and possibly other GAPIC attributes (469290e)
Dependencies
  • Update shared dependencies (#2697) (611ad20)

Python

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.34.0 (2025-10-16)

Features
  • Add support for Python 3.14 (#1217) (263332a)
entry.summary: This is a weekly digest of client library updates, including new features and bug fixes for Java and Python.
entry.title: Libraries: Client Library Updates

entry.content: You can save queries and then view and manage the saved queries in Bigtable Studio. This feature is in Preview.
entry.summary: Bigtable Studio now allows you to save queries for later use. You can view and manage these saved queries directly within Bigtable Studio. This feature is currently in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: Save and manage queries in Bigtable Studio

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Java

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.67.1 (2025-10-08)

Dependencies
  • Update shared dependencies (#2686) (d7eaa02)

Python

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.33.0 (2025-10-06)

Features
  • Add support for Proto and Enum types (#1202) (34ceb86)
  • Expose universe_domain for tpc (#1150) (451fd97)
Bug Fixes
  • Fix instance registration cleanup on early iterator termination (#1216) (bbfd746)
  • Refactor channel refresh (#1174) (6fa3008)
entry.summary: Here are the latest updates for client libraries. The Java library for bigtable has updated dependencies. The Python library for bigtable has new features including support for Proto and Enum types, and bug fixes for instance registration cleanup and channel refresh.
entry.title: Libraries: Client Library Updates

entry.content: The Cassandra-Bigtable proxy adapter, which lets you connect your Apache Cassandra-based applications to Bigtable, is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: The Cassandra-Bigtable proxy adapter is now generally available. This feature allows applications based on Apache Cassandra to connect to Bigtable.
entry.title: Feature: Cassandra-Bigtable proxy adapter now available

entry.content: You can connect to Bigtable from Java applications and other reporting tools that support a generic JDBC adapter by using the Bigtable JDBC driver. This feature is available in Preview.
entry.summary: Connect to Bigtable using JDBC. This feature is available in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: Bigtable JDBC driver now in Preview

entry.content: You can optimize storage with Bigtable tiered storage, reduce storage costs, and retain data for longer. This feature is available in Preview.
entry.summary: Optimize storage costs and retain data longer with Bigtable tiered storage, now in preview.
entry.title: Feature: Bigtable Tiered Storage

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Java

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.67.0 (2025-09-24)

Features
  • Idle channel eviction (#2651) (70c05c9)
  • Load balancing options for BigtableChannelPool (#2667) (5adaa84)
Bug Fixes
  • Add missing break; to PROTO and ENUM value type check (#2672) (337e432)
  • Remove beta api annotation for query paginator (#2660) (f68a1fa)
Dependencies
  • Update shared dependencies (#2679) (a5b8260)
entry.summary: The latest updates to the Java Bigtable client library include new features like idle channel eviction and load balancing options. Bug fixes address type checking and beta API annotations, alongside shared dependency updates.
entry.title: Libraries: Java Bigtable client library updates

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Node.js

Changes for @google-cloud/bigtable

6.4.1 (2025-09-09)

Bug Fixes
  • Directly import JS-native impl for crc32c on non-x64 platforms to avoid segfault (#1715) (9848963)

Java

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.66.0 (2025-09-10)

Features
  • Add support for Proto and Enum types (#2662) (da3065d)
Dependencies
  • Update dependency com.google.cloud:sdk-platform-java-config to v3.52.1 (#2668) (06ac93e)
entry.summary: This is a weekly digest of client library updates. This week, we have updates for Node.js Bigtable, including a bug fix for non-x64 platforms, and for Java Bigtable, which adds support for Proto and Enum types.
entry.title: Libraries: Client Library Updates

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Java

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.65.1 (2025-08-27)

Dependencies
  • Update shared dependencies (#2664) (841318b)
entry.summary: Weekly updates for client libraries.
entry.title: Libraries: Client library updates

entry.content:
Bigtable tools are available in Agent Development Kit (ADK). With these tools, you can build AI agents that can interact with Bigtable data and metadata in the following ways:

  • Obtain metadata about Bigtable tables and instances.
  • Execute LLM-powered SQL queries.
entry.summary: Bigtable tools are now available in the Agent Development Kit (ADK). These tools enable the creation of AI agents that can interact with Bigtable data and metadata, including obtaining table/instance metadata and executing LLM-powered SQL queries.
entry.title: Announcement: Bigtable Tools in ADK

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Node.js

Changes for @google-cloud/bigtable

6.4.0 (2025-08-21)

Features
  • Enable csm by default (#1695) (9744aa3)
  • For application latencies timed stream a few cosmetic changes are needed (#1645) (75d1a6f)
entry.summary: Client library updates for Node.js, including changes to @google-cloud/bigtable.
entry.title: Libraries: Node.js Client Library Updates

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Node.js

Changes for @google-cloud/bigtable

6.3.0 (2025-08-11)

Features
  • Add client side metrics for checkAndMutateRow calls (#1661) (c258ea1)
  • Add client side metrics for readModifyWriteRow calls (#1656) (2129312)
  • Client side metrics support for mutateRows (#1638) (7601e4d)
  • Collect client side metrics for sampleRowKeys calls (#1660) (6ed98fa)
  • For client side metrics, record metrics as MUTATE_ROW for single row mutates (#1650) (f190a8c)
  • Record ReadRows application latencies for client side metrics (#1647) (8af801b)
Bug Fixes
  • FirstResponseLatencies should only be collected for readRows calls (#1658) (99cf5a6)

Java

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.65.0 (2025-08-12)

Features
  • bigtable: Lower the value for max rpc channels as channel resize is slow (1m, 2 channel) (#2656) (d8055c1)
entry.summary: Client library updates for Node.js and Java Bigtable, including new metrics and performance improvements.
entry.title: Libraries: Client Library Updates

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Java

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.64.0 (2025-08-08)

Features
  • Add tags field to Instance proto (stable branch) (089d527)
Dependencies
  • Update shared dependencies (#2654) (4b706f4)
  • Update the Java code generator (gapic-generator-java) to 2.61.0 (089d527)

Python

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.32.0 (2025-08-01)

Features
  • Add Idempotency to Cloud Bigtable MutateRowsRequest API (#1143) (c3e3eb0)
  • Add support for AddToCell in Data Client (#1147) (1a5b4b5)

  • Modernized Bigtable Admin Client featuring selective GAPIC generation (#1177) (58e7d37)
entry.summary: Client library updates for Java and Python Bigtable.
entry.title: Libraries: Client Library Updates

entry.content: You can add the Cassandra to Bigtable client for Java library to your Java project from the Maven Central repository.
entry.summary: New Java client for Bigtable available on Maven Central.
entry.title: Announcement: Cassandra to Bigtable Java Client

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Java

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.63.0 (2025-07-30)

Features
  • Add Idempotency to Cloud Bigtable MutateRowsRequest API (bc58b4f)
  • Add port as a parameter for the Bigtable emulator (#2645) (5acd3dc)
  • Add type support for Proto and Enum (bc58b4f)
  • Publish Proto and Enum types to CBT data API (ace12d5)
  • Selective GAPIC autogeneration for Python Bigtable Admin (e219c38)
Bug Fixes
  • deps: Update the Java code generator (gapic-generator-java) to 2.60.2 (e219c38)
  • Update routing_parameters.path_template (e219c38)
Dependencies
  • Update sdk-platorm-java-config to 3.50.2 (#2646) (03e6961)
Documentation
  • Sync generated comments from the API Protos (bc58b4f)
entry.summary: Java client library for Bigtable receives an update.
entry.title: Libraries: Bigtable Java library update

entry.content: Logical views for Bigtable are now generally available (GA). Logical views let you save a SQL query as a specific, shareable view of your data—even with a flexible schema—and then control who has permission to see the results.
entry.summary: Bigtable now supports logical views, allowing you to save SQL queries as shareable data views with permission controls.
entry.title: Feature: Bigtable Logical Views Now GA

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Node.js

Changes for @google-cloud/bigtable

6.2.0 (2025-07-23)

Features
  • Add client-side metrics collection to readRows calls (#1571) (71f4d78)
  • Add plumbing to support unary calls for client side metric collection (#1631) (c267ede)
  • Add support for Execute Query (#1613) (e3894ed)
  • Initial timed stream implementation for application latencies (#1639) (ca490e8)
Bug Fixes
  • In client-side metrics, make sure that the right views get created for the right metrics (#1590) (6cb7cdd)
entry.summary: Node.js Bigtable client library updates.
entry.title: Libraries: Node.js Bigtable v6.2.0

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Java

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.62.0 (2025-07-15)

Features
  • Add Idempotency to Cloud Bigtable MutateRowRequest API (b5acca6)
  • Add SchemaBundles API (b5acca6)
  • bigtable: Add schema bundle support (#2619) (7d7b9a9)
  • Next release from main branch is 2.62.0 (#2621) (202b211)
Dependencies
  • Minor cleanup (#2623) (7b230e8)
  • Update shared dependencies (#2616) (eb7cfd5)
entry.summary: This release of the Java client library for Bigtable (version 2.62.0) introduces idempotency for the MutateRowRequest API and adds support for SchemaBundles. It also includes dependency updates and minor code cleanup.
entry.title: Libraries: Java Bigtable Client Library Update

entry.content: When you undelete a table, Bigtable automatically enables deletion protection for that table.
entry.summary: Bigtable automatically enables deletion protection for tables when they are undeleted.
entry.title: Changed: Deletion protection enabled after undeleting tables

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Java

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.61.0 (2025-06-27)

Features
  • Add getter for universe domain in JwtCredentialsWithAudience (#2598) (9ad66b1)
Bug Fixes
  • Add name elements for the pom.xml files (a873719)
  • Populate table ID for materialized view (#2610) (50c3fe2)
Dependencies
  • Update shared dependencies (#2605) (4cc7246)
entry.summary: This release of the java-bigtable client library includes a new getter for universe domain in JwtCredentialsWithAudience, fixes for pom.xml elements and materialized view table ID, and updated shared dependencies.
entry.title: Libraries: Java Bigtable Client Library Update

entry.content: You can use Data Boost to analyze your Bigtable data with BigQuery without impacting the performance of the clusters that handle your application traffic. This feature is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Analyze your Bigtable data using BigQuery without affecting your cluster performance. This feature is now generally available.
entry.title: Feature: Bigtable data analysis with BigQuery

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Java

Changes for google-cloud-bigtable

2.60.0 (2025-06-06)

Features
  • Improve error message on malformed struct (#2592) (7f5fdf0)
  • Run ExecuteQuery conformance tests (#2557) (0bbc083)
Bug Fixes
  • deps: Update the Java code generator (gapic-generator-java) to 2.59.0 (65782aa)
  • Ensure that multiple instances of a client in the same process don't clobber each other (#2590) (8d3dca4)
Dependencies
  • Update shared dependencies (#2587) (8ec0339)
entry.summary: This release of the Java client library for Bigtable includes improved error messages for malformed structs and ensures that multiple client instances in the same process do not interfere with each other. It also updates the Java code generator and shared dependencies.
entry.title: Libraries: Java Bigtable Client Library Updates

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Node.js

Changes for @google-cloud/bigtable

6.1.0 (2025-05-30)

Features
  • Add full support for the universe domain (#1604) (4562e23)
entry.summary: This is a weekly digest of client library updates for Node.js, including features like full support for the universe domain in @google-cloud/bigtable.
entry.title: Libraries: Node.js Client Library Updates

entry.content:
The Bigtable Spark connector supports Scala versions 2.12 and 2.13 in all connector versions and has been updated as follows:

  • Connector versions 0.5.0 and later support dynamic columns.
  • Connector versions 0.6.0 and later support custom authentication providers and efficient joins with data sources.
entry.summary: The Bigtable Spark connector now supports Scala versions 2.12 and 2.13. Recent updates include support for dynamic columns in version 0.5.0 and later, and custom authentication providers along with efficient joins in version 0.6.0 and later.
entry.title: Changed: Bigtable Spark Connector Updates

entry.content: You can delete logical and continuous materialized views in the Google Cloud console. For more information, see Delete a logical view or Delete a continuous materialized view.
entry.summary: You can now delete logical and continuous materialized views through the Google Cloud console. For detailed instructions, refer to the documentation on deleting logical views or continuous materialized views.
entry.title: Announcement: Manage Materialized Views in Google Cloud Console
